text:
Here’s my best understanding of how networking works:

Step 1) Ask yourself what job you want, and in what field.
Step 2) Look up the fastest-growing companies in that field.
Step 3) Look up what each of those companies does.
Step 4) Go to their LinkedIn, in order of how much you like them, and look up people doing the job you want.
Step 5) Connect with a few of those people and ask them about their jobs.
Step 6) If you like what you hear, tell them so and why.
Step 7) Let them respond.
Step 8) Politely ask to come aboard.
Step 9) A job might or might not be created for you, but either way, you now are on good terms with someone in a company you want to work for.
Step 10) Repeat until this works.
